title: Ghats, Ganga & Wildlife

seo.meta_title: Ghats, Ganga & Wildlife Tour | 12-Day India Itinerary
seo.meta_description: Explore the spiritual ghats of Varanasi, track tigers in Corbett & Dudhwa National Parks on this curated 12-day wildlife and cultural journey through India.

highlights.title: Tiger Safari in Corbett
highlights.description: Track the majestic Bengal tiger in its natural habitat.

highlights.title: Ganga Aarti in Varanasi
highlights.description: Experience the spiritual evening ceremony on the ghats.

highlights.title: Ancient Temples
highlights.description: Explore the timeless architecture of Varanasi's temples.

dayByDay.title: Arrival in Delhi
dayByDay.description: Arrive at Delhi International Airport. You will be met by our representative and transferred to the hotel. Overnight at the hotel.

dayByDay.title: Delhi to Corbett National Park
dayByDay.description: After breakfast, drive to Corbett National Park. On arrival, check in at the wildlife resort. In the evening, enjoy a nature walk along the Kosi River. Overnight at the resort.

video.caption: Welcome to the realm of the tiger. Corbett is India's first and most celebrated National Park.

dayByDay.title: Safari in Corbett National Park
dayByDay.description: Enjoy morning and evening jeep safaris in the park. Explore the different zones of Corbett, each offering a unique landscape and a chance to spot tigers, elephants, leopards, and over 600 species of birds. Overnight at the resort.

dayByDay.title: Corbett to Dudhwa National Park
dayByDay.description: After breakfast, drive to Dudhwa National Park. On arrival, check in at the resort. The park is known for its successful conservation of the one-horned rhinoceros. Overnight at the resort.

dayByDay.title: Safari in Dudhwa National Park
dayByDay.description: Enjoy morning and evening jeep safaris in the park. Explore the dense forests and vast grasslands, home to the rhino, swamp deer (Barasingha), and a significant tiger population. Overnight at the resort.

video.caption: The Terai grasslands of Dudhwa, a critical habitat for the magnificent one-horned rhinoceros.

dayByDay.title: Dudhwa to Lucknow, then fly to Varanasi
dayByDay.description: After breakfast, drive to Lucknow airport to board the flight for Varanasi. On arrival in Varanasi, you will be met and transferred to the hotel. In the evening, witness the spectacular Ganga Aarti ceremony. Overnight at the hotel.

dayByDay.title: Varanasi Sightseeing
dayByDay.description: Enjoy a morning boat ride on the holy river Ganges to see the bathing ghats and cremation sites. Later, visit Sarnath, the place where Lord Buddha delivered his first sermon. Overnight at the hotel.

dayByDay.title: Varanasi Sightseeing
dayByDay.description: Today, explore the ancient city of Varanasi, visiting its famous temples like Kashi Vishwanath Temple and the bustling, narrow lanes. Experience the spiritual heart of India. Overnight at the hotel.

video.caption: Varanasi, the spiritual capital of India, where life and death unfold on the banks of the sacred Ganga.

dayByDay.title: Varanasi to Agra
dayByDay.description: After breakfast, transfer to the railway station to board the train for Agra. On arrival in Agra, check in at the hotel. Overnight at the hotel.

dayByDay.title: Agra Sightseeing
dayByDay.description: Visit the magnificent Taj Mahal at sunrise, a testament to eternal love. Later, visit the historic Agra Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Overnight at the hotel.

dayByDay.title: Agra to Delhi
dayByDay.description: After breakfast, drive back to Delhi. On arrival, check in at the hotel. The rest of the day is free for leisure or last-minute shopping. Overnight at the hotel.

dayByDay.title: Departure from Delhi
dayByDay.description: After breakfast, you will be transferred to the international airport to board your flight for your onward journey.

inclusions: All transfers and sightseeing by an air-conditioned vehicle.
Jeep safaris in Corbett and Dudhwa National Parks.
Services of a local English-speaking guide.
exclusions: Monuments and national parks entrance fees.
Expenses of personal nature like tips, telephone calls, laundry, liquor etc.
Any other item not specified in the 'cost includes' column.
